metadata.name: The Neighbors' Window
metadata.description:
1/1 Video
1920 x 1080 


The Neighbors' Window is the first NFT from this collection of videos. Created in collaboration with fellow artist Natali ( @Tatana)

This is a collection of Voyeuristic videos created in collaboration with women from around the world.
We are watching them from outside their windows, when they think they are Home Alone.

But there is hint of female empowerment, since
the women are in control of the voyeurism; they are the camera operators and the performers. Itâ€™s ultimately up to them what we see.
